kv2.9:5.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv2.9:5.2: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ, vicikicchaṁ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:5.3: Catubhāgaṁ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṁ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṅkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe… saṅghe …pe… ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato catubhāgaṁ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?
kv2.9:6.4: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ, vicikicchaṁ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:6.5: Catubhāgaṁ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṁ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṅkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe… saṅghe …pe… ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, catubhāgaṁ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?
kv2.9:7.1: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv2.9:7.2: Oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ, oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:7.3: Catubhāgaṁ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv2.9:7.8: Oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgaṁ, oḷārikaṁ byāpādaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:7.9: Catubhāgaṁ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv2.9:8.1: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv2.9:8.2: Aṇusahagataṁ kāmarāgaṁ, aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:8.3: Catubhāgaṁ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ antarāparinibbāyī …pe… upahaccaparinibbāyī … asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṁ na uddhaṁsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv2.9:9.4: Aṇusahagataṁ kāmarāgaṁ, aṇusahagataṁ byāpādaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:9.5: Catubhāgaṁ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ antarāparinibbāyī …pe… upahaccaparinibbāyī … asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṁ na uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv2.9:10.1: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṁ jahatīti?
kv2.9:10.2: Rūparāgaṁ, arūparāgaṁ, mānaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, avijjaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:10.3: Catubhāgaṁ arahā, catubhāgaṁ na arahā, catubhāgaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ vītarāgo …pe… vītadoso … vītamoho …pe… katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṁ tassa pariññātaṁ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṁ abhiññātaṁ, pariññeyyaṁ pariññātaṁ, pahātabbaṁ pahīnaṁ, bhāvetabbaṁ bhāvitaṁ …pe… sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, catubhāgaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv2.9:11.2: Rūparāgaṁ, arūparāgaṁ, mānaṁ, uddhaccaṁ, avijjaṁ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṁ jahatīti.
kv2.9:11.3: Catubhāgaṁ arahā, catubhāgaṁ na arahā, catubhāgaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṁ vītarāgo …pe… vītadoso … vītamoho … katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṁ tassa pariññātaṁ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṁ abhiññātaṁ, pariññeyyaṁ pariññātaṁ, pahātabbaṁ pahīnaṁ, bhāvitabbaṁ bhāvitaṁ …pe… sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, catubhāgaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ na sacchikatanti?
kv2.9:12.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:13.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo maggaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:13.3: Dukkhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:13.5: maggaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:13.8: nirodhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?
kv2.9:14.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:14.4: Maggaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:14.8: nirodhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:14.11: Maggaṁ dakkhanto “paṭipannako”ti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:15.1: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:15.7: nirodhaṁ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṁ—
kv2.9:16.1: Dukkhe diṭṭhe cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:17.1: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭhe pañcakkhandhā aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?
kv2.9:18.1: Cakkhāyatane aniccato diṭṭhe dvādasāyatanāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:19.1: Cakkhudhātuyā aniccato diṭṭhāya aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?
kv2.9:20.1: Cakkhundriye aniccato diṭṭhe bāvīsatindriyāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?
kv2.9:22.5: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;
kv2.9:22.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho”ti.
kv2.9:26.4: “sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
kv2.9:26.5: ‘yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:26.6: yo dukkhasamudayaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:26.7: yo dukkhanirodhaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passati;
kv2.9:26.8: yo dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhampi passatī’”ti.
kv2.9:30.4: “yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
kv2.9:30.5: ‘yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti—
